string.text: Add primary interaction to pick up prop items

Many Hideout Furniture items already have primary interactions, such as the beds and interactive lights. If a prop item does not already have one, and this setting is enabled, DotMarks will add a custom primary interaction that allows you to pick up the prop immediately, without having to long-press the Hideout Furniture menu.
Show prompt for Hideout Furniture's default menu

If DotMarks has not already added a custom secondary action to an item, and this setting is enabled, DotMarks will show a secondary prompt for the default Hideout Furniture menu--which is normally accessed via long-press of the primary use key.
